response: * Major Hon Denis Gomer Berry (born 11 July 1911, died 30 September 1983), father of Richard Berry, 3rd Viscount Kemsley: Denis married Rosemary Leonora Ruth de Rothschild for the first time.Rosemary Leonara Ruth de Rothschild (1913-2013) Rothschild Archive
